scripts.setup: yarn setup_ledgerjs && yarn setup_hid && yarn setup_ava && yarn link_hid && yarn link_ava
scripts.setup_hid: cd ledgerjs/packages/hw-transport-node-hid && npm install --save-dev babel-cli && yarn build
scripts.link_hid: cd ledgerjs/packages/hw-transport-node-hid && yarn link && cd - && yarn link @ledgerhq/hw-transport-node-hid
scripts.setup_ava: cd ledgerjs/packages/hw-app-avalanche && npm install --save-dev babel-cli && yarn build
scripts.link_ava: cd ledgerjs/packages/hw-app-avalanche && yarn link && cd - && yarn link @ledgerhq/hw-app-avalanche
